markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />Interact ([electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)); **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You release the majority of the stored up energy from your _storm chair_, devastating foes in a chain of electricity. This has the effects of [_chain lightning_](/Spells.aspx?ID=33) with a DC of 31.
name: Interact (electricity, evocation, magical);
